renameAccountModal.nameInputPlaceholder: Enter a name for your account

anonymousDataSharing.title: Anonymous data sharing
anonymousDataSharing.description: Allow Freighter to collect limited information about usage. We will collect public keys, transaction amounts, and balances. This information will not be used for marketing or to identify you personally. We will not collect information such as name, address, email addresses, phone numbers, etc.

enable.title: Enable Analytics
enable.description: To enable anonymous data sharing, you'll need to allow tracking permissions in your device settings.
enable.instruction: Tap "Open Settings" below, then find Freighter and enable "Allow Tracking".

disable.title: Disable Analytics
disable.description: To disable anonymous data sharing, you'll need to change tracking permissions in your device settings.
disable.instruction: Tap "Open Settings" below, then find Freighter and disable "Allow Tracking".

memoValidation.title: Verification with stellar.expert
memoValidation.description: Validate addresses that require a memo

aboutScreen.title: About
aboutScreen.freighterDescription: Freighter is a non-custodial wallet for the Stellar blockchain

bottomSheet.title: Receive XLM

bottomSheet.description: You need at least 1 XLM to have an account on Stellar. Add Stellar Lumens (XLM) easily transferring from another wallet to this wallet.

We cannot recover your password for you.
Make sure you keep this in a safe place.

confirmPasswordScreen.title: Confirm Password
confirmPasswordScreen.footerNoteText:

recoveryPhraseAlertScreen.title: Recovery Phrase

discovery.legalDisclaimer: By connecting to these dapps, you acknowledge that you're interacting with them at your own risk. We cannot recover funds. Never share your recovery phrase or private key.

recoveryPhraseWarning.yourRecoveryPhrase: Your recovery phrase gives you full access to your wallets and funds.
recoveryPhraseWarning.ifYouForgetYourPassword: If you forget your password, use the recovery phrase to access your wallet
recoveryPhraseWarning.dontShareWithAnyone: Don't share this phrase with anyone
recoveryPhraseWarning.neverAskForYourPhrase: Stellar Development Foundation will never ever ask for your phrase
recoveryPhraseWarning.ifYouLose: If you lose it, we can't recover it

error.failedToCreateAccount: Failed to create account. Please try again.

unfundedAccount.message: To start using this account, fund it with at least 1 XLM.

moreInfo.title: Manage Assets
moreInfo.block1: When you manage assets on the Stellar blockchain, you're creating and controlling digital representations of value, such as currencies or tokens.
moreInfo.block2: This involves setting up trustlines, which allow users to hold and trade your assets, and configuring flags to control access and usage. By leveraging these features, you can securely issue, distribute, and manage your assets while maintaining compliance and flexibility.

removeAssetAlert.title: Remove asset
removeAssetAlert.message: Are you sure you want to remove this asset?

addAssetScreen.title: Add an asset
addAssetScreen.disclaimer: Allow token to be displayed in your wallet. This does not add the token to your account.
addAssetScreen.confirmTrust: Only confirm if you trust this token
addAssetScreen.maliciousAsset: This token was flagged as malicious
addAssetScreen.suspiciousAsset: This token was flagged as suspicious
addAssetScreen.somethingWentWrong: Something went wrong, please try again later

securityWarning.unsafeTransaction: This transaction does not appear safe for the following reasons.

security.notOnYourLists: This asset is not on one of your lists

review.title: You are swapping
review.warning: Make sure to review the transaction above, once you confirm it's irreversible

errors.insufficientXlmForFees: Insufficient XLM for transaction fees. You need at least {{fee}} XLM to pay the transaction fee.
errors.noPathFound: No path found between these assets

swapProcessingScreen.closeMessage: You can close this screen, your transaction should be complete in less than a minute

memoInfo.title: Memo
memoInfo.description: Some destination accounts on the Stellar network require a memo to identify your payment.
memoInfo.additionalInfo: If a required memo is missing or incorrect, your funds may not reach the intended recipient.

timeoutInfo.title: Transaction timeout
timeoutInfo.description: Transactions on the Stellar network have a set time limit for processing.
timeoutInfo.additionalInfo: If the transaction is not confirmed before this time, it will expire and need to be submitted again.

feeInfo.title: Transaction fee
feeInfo.description: Every transaction on the Stellar network includes a small fee to help keep the network secure.
feeInfo.additionalInfo: You can choose to increase this fee if you want your transaction to be prioritized and processed faster by the network.

addMemoExplanationBottomSheet.title: Memo is required
addMemoExplanationBottomSheet.description: A destination account requires the use of the memo field which is not present in the transaction you're about to sign.
addMemoExplanationBottomSheet.disabledWarning: Freighter automatically disabled the option to sign this transaction.
addMemoExplanationBottomSheet.checkMemoRequirements: Check the destination account memo requirements and include it in the transaction.

welcomeBanner.fundingText2: fund it with at least 1 XLM.
welcomeBanner.minimumBalanceText: Stellar accounts require a minimum balance of 1 XLM to ensure network security and prevent spam.
welcomeBanner.reserveExplanationText: This reserve helps maintain the ledger by covering transaction fees and discouraging the creation of unnecessary accounts, keeping the system efficient and functional.
